item.title: SlGSTU38
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g011580.2 Gene Symbol: SlGSTU38 Gene Name: glutathione S-transferase 38 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato SlGSTU38 interacts with the PepMV coat protein and promotes viral infection.
